name: Don't Go on the boat
description:
The girl was told to not get on the boat by herself, but she still did thinking that she would get to have a dream like adventure exploring through the beauty of nature. Instead, she will unexpectedly encounter the frightening side of it .

You take the perspective of the girl and the main purpose is to go through all of the challenges and obstacles that you will come across during the boat ride disaster making sure that you keep the girl alive despite putting herself in all the trouble.        

This game is based of an extract from the 'Prelude' poem by William Wordsworth. 

The game isn't complete yet so I would really appreciate some feedback on what I have so far with the animation and art style and on what I could do to improve, thanks!

I still need to include the menu and game over parts and a lot more to the game.

(The tree assets that I used belong to Barf Vader from Itch.)
